images.caption: Figure 1:Routing results by GRIN-MoE[26]layer 21 and Jamba-Mini-1.6[20]layer 25 on the same input (Java code). Despite having similar model sizes and the same number of experts, GRIN-MoE exhibits more consistent routing patterns than Jamba-Mini-1.6, with multiple experts continuously activated, so expert caching with GRIN-MoE will be more feasible and effective.
